package com.controller1;

import com.service1.EmployeeeService;

public class EmployeeeController {

	public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		EmployeeeService ser=new EmployeeeService();
		ser.insertData();
		ser.updateData();
		ser.deleteData();
		ser.getSingleData();
	        ser.getAlleData();
	}

}
